io.cdap.http.internal

Class HttpResourceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cdap.http.internal.HttpResourceHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.cdap.http.HttpHandler

    public final class HttpResourceHandler
extends Object
implements io.cdap.http.HttpHandler
    HttpResourceHandler handles the http request. HttpResourceHandler looks up all Jax-rs annotations in classes and dispatches to appropriate method on receiving requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpResourceHandler(Iterable<? extends io.cdap.http.HttpHandler> handlers, Iterable<? extends io.cdap.http.HandlerHook> handlerHooks, io.cdap.http.URLRewriter urlRewriter, io.cdap.http.ExceptionHandler exceptionHandler)
      Construct HttpResourceHandler.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy(io.cdap.http.HandlerContext context) 
      io.cdap.http.internal.HttpMethodInfo getDestinationMethod(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request, HttpResponder responder)
      Call the appropriate handler for handling the httprequest. 404 if path is not found. 405 if path is found but httpMethod does not match what's configured.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpResourceHandler

        public HttpResourceHandler(Iterable<? extends io.cdap.http.HttpHandler> handlers,
                   Iterable<? extends io.cdap.http.HandlerHook> handlerHooks,
                   io.cdap.http.URLRewriter urlRewriter,
                   io.cdap.http.ExceptionHandler exceptionHandler)
        Construct HttpResourceHandler. Reads all annotations from all the handler classes and methods passed in, constructs patternPathRouter which is routable by path to HttpResourceModel as destination of the route.
        Parameters:
        handlers - Iterable of HttpHandler.
        handlerHooks - Iterable of HandlerHook.
        urlRewriter - URL re-writer.
        exceptionHandler - Exception handler

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request,
          HttpResponder responder)
        Call the appropriate handler for handling the httprequest. 404 if path is not found. 405 if path is found but httpMethod does not match what's configured.
        Parameters:
        request - instance of HttpRequest
        responder - instance of HttpResponder to handle the request.

      • getDestinationMethod

        @Nullable
public io.cdap.http.internal.HttpMethodInfo getDestinationMethod(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request,
                                                                 HttpResponder responder)
                                                          throws Exception
        Call the appropriate handler for handling the httprequest. 404 if path is not found. 405 if path is found but httpMethod does not match what's configured.
        Parameters:
        request - instance of HttpRequest
        responder - instance of HttpResponder to handle the request.
        Returns:
        HttpMethodInfo object, null if urlRewriter rewrite returns false, also when method cannot be invoked.
        Throws:
        Exception
